entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 08:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -33.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -36.4°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
